diff_hunk:
@@ -1532,24 +1454,11 @@
     - THTensor* self
 ]]
 [[
-  name: tan_
-  types:
-    - floating_point
-  backends:
-    - CPU
-    - CUDA
+  name: _tan
body: Yeah, but right now it's super inconsistent. Some functions will use the `_th_` form, others will only have `_`. Prefixing all of them with `_th` would just seem easier to reason about (and would be clear what happens when you use them in your code). Not a big deal though.
body_html: Yeah, but right now it's super inconsistent. Some functions will use the _th_ form, others will only have _. Prefixing all of them with _th would just seem easier to reason about (and would be clear what happens when you use them in your code). Not a big deal though.
body_text: Yeah, but right now it's super inconsistent. Some functions will use the _th_ form, others will only have _. Prefixing all of them with _th would just seem easier to reason about (and would be clear what happens when you use them in your code). Not a big deal though.
